title: Part 2: Ryan Long + News (ACS September 28)
itunes:title: Part 2: Ryan Long + News (ACS September 28)
description:
Comedian Ryan Long is in the studio to talk about his comedy tour and explains how quickly shifting trends make it near impossible to release relevant content on time. As a punk rocker himself, Ryan weighs in on the song ‘Uh Oh, Chongo’ and talks about how comedians make the best comedy editors. Gina Grad reports the news of today including: someone hacking into an airplane intercom, NASA’s anti-asteroid satellite successfully smashing into a space rock, a cranberry shortage looming ahead of Thanksgiving, Tiffany Haddish saying she lost all of her gigs after the abuse claim, and Gwyneth Paltrow releasing nudes on her 50th birthday. 

PLUGS:

See Ryan Long live on tour: 

CLEVELAND, OH - HILARITIES - OCTOBER 2nd

CHICAGO, IL - ZANIES COMEDY CLUB - OCTOBER 3rd & 4th 

And find more dates at RyanLongComedy.com

Listen to ‘The Boyscast with Ryan Long’ wherever you find podcast

And follow Ryan on Twitter and Instagram, @RyanLongComedy

THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

Con-Cret.com/PODCAST

Geico.com

Get a 4-week trial, free postage, and a digital scale at https://www.stamps.com/ADAM. Thanks to Stamps.com for sponsoring the show
